thread.title: Prithviraj bowls over AAA scribes
thread.title_full: Prithviraj bowls over AAA scribes - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: Prithviraj bowls over AAA scribes
text:
When Vishnu Unnikrishnan and Bipin George narrated the script of Amar Akbar Anthony to Prithviraj , it seemed like a dream far from reality.
In a recent interview, Vishnu said that he and Bipin were overwhelmed to see the simplicity of the Ennu Ninte Moideen actor.
The young scriptwriter said that the duo were completely bowled over when Prithviraj, who had worked with biggies such as Mani Ratnam, sat before them with the same fervour.
